contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 28, 1907 D Crystal Palace (Junior Cup)
Crystal Palace (Junior Cup) 130 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) crystal-palace-junior-cup
Third
The Viking's Daughter
Crystal Palace (Terrace Bandstand), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK 1st prize £5 and cup. 2nd prize £3. 3rd prize £2. 4th prize £1.
13 bands competed.
Bestwood Colliery originally placed 1st, then disqualified. Ref. p.835, BB 1907.
April 7, 2012, 11:58 a.m. July 6, 2015, 4:11 p.m.
